column1: I miss the taste of a sweeter life
column2: 我怀念曾经的美好甜蜜
column4: 我想念那时的你侬我侬 唇齿相依
column5: I’m searching for a song tonight
column6: 我试图找首歌来把自己治愈
column7: I’m changing all of the stations
column8: 但电台换来换去却始终难觅佳音
column9: I like to think that we had it all
column10: 曾经的我们拥有想要的一切
column11: We drew a map to a better place
column12: 也曾描绘着美好蓝图憧憬我们共同的明天
column13: But on that road I took a fall
column15: Oh baby why did you run away
column16: 哦亲爱的你却为何要执意丢下我
column17: I was there for you in your darkest times
column18: 在你最黑暗的日子我仍然不离不弃
column19: I was there for you in your darkest nights
column20: 在你最难熬的时光里我依然陪伴着你
column21: But I wonder where were you when I was at my worst down on my knees
column22: 但如今你又在哪里 当我陷入低谷 失落孤立
column23: And you said you had my back so I wonder where were you
column24: 你说过你会给我支持鼓励 而如今你又在哪里
column25: When all the roads you took came back to me
column26: 但我始终相信你会回来 相信你只是暂时离去
column27: So I’m following the map that leads to you
column28: 所以我按着我们共同描绘的这张地图找寻你
column29: The map that leads to you
column32: 是我唯一能依靠的全部
column33: The map that leads to you
column38: 让我紧紧跟随 追寻着你的脚步
column39: The map that leads to you
column42: 是我唯一能依靠的全部
column43: The map that leads to you
column48: 让我紧紧跟随 追寻着你的脚步
column49: I hear your voice in my sleep at night
column50: 睡梦里你的温柔低语总在耳边萦绕
column52: 这感觉难以抗拒 我在劫难逃
column53: Cause something strange has come over me
column54: 有种莫名的难过总埋在我心里
column55: And now I can’t get over you
column57: No I just can’t get over you
column58: 我真的真的无法将你忘记
